dcterms:description: VITON is a dataset for image-based virtual try-on, containing a training set of 14,221 image pairs and a testing dataset of 2,032 pairs. Each pair consists of a person image and the corresponding garment image, both at a resolution of 256 Ã— 192.
dcterms:title: VITON

dcterms:description: Augmented VITON is a testing dataset created by randomly augmenting the testing person images in VITON to evaluate the model's robustness to misalignments with garment images. It includes shifts and zooms of the original images.
dcterms:title: augmented VITON
